languages.text: "Что за чушь ты городишь. То, что власть — это бремя, придумали те, у кого она есть, чтобы им не так завидовали. Я отлично справлял{mf|ся|ась} в одиночку и доказал{mf||а}, что мне никто не нужен. Ясно тебе?! Никто!"
"Rubbish! The burden of power is a fiction invented by the powerful to shield themselves against envy. I did just fine on my own and proved that I need no one else. Do you hear me? No one!"
languages.original_text: "Что за чушь ты городишь. То, что власть — это бремя, придумали те, у кого она есть, чтобы им не так завидовали. Я отлично справлял{mf|ся|ась} в одиночку и доказал{mf||а}, что мне никто не нужен. Ясно тебе?! Никто!"

traits.locale_text: "What nonsense. Calling authority a burden is an invention of those who have it so they would not be envied quite as much. I did just fine on my own and proved that I need no one else. Did you hear me?! No one!"
traits.speaker: RTNeutralFemale

traits.locale_text: "What nonsense. Calling authority a burden is an invention of those who have it so they would not be envied quite as much. I did just fine on my own and proved that I need no one else. Did you hear me?! No one!"
traits.speaker: RTNeutralFemale

traits.locale_text: "Rubbish! The burden of power is a fiction invented by the powerful to shield themselves against envy. I did just fine on my own and proved that I need no one else. Do you hear me? No one!"

traits.locale_text: "Rubbish! The burden of power is a fiction invented by the powerful to shield themselves against envy. I did just fine on my own and proved that I need no one else. Do you hear me? No one!"
traits.speaker: RTNeutralFemale

languages.text: « Foutaises ! Le fardeau du pouvoir n'est qu'un mythe inventé par les puissants pour se protéger de la convoitise des autres. Je me suis très bien {mf|débrouillé seul|débrouillée seule} et j'ai prouvé que je n'avais besoin de personne. Vous m'entendez ? Personne ! »
languages.original_text: "Rubbish! The burden of power is a fiction invented by the powerful to shield themselves against envy. I did just fine on my own and proved that I need no one else. Do you hear me? No one!"

traits.locale_text: « Foutaises ! Le fardeau du pouvoir n'est qu'un mythe inventé par les puissants pour se protéger de la convoitise des autres. Je me suis très bien {mf|débrouillé seul|débrouillée seule} et j'ai prouvé que je n'avais besoin de personne. Vous m'entendez ? Personne ! »
traits.speaker: RTNeutralFemale

languages.text: «¡Tonterías! Considerar que el poder es una carga es un invento de quienes lo tienen para que los demás no les envidien tanto. Me ha ido bien por mi cuenta y he demostrado que no necesito a nadie. ¿Me oyes? ¡A nadie!».
languages.original_text: "Rubbish! The burden of power is a fiction invented by the powerful to shield themselves against envy. I did just fine on my own and proved that I need no one else. Do you hear me? No one!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Tonterías! Considerar que la autoridad es una carga es un invento de quienes la tienen para que los demás no les envidien tanto. Me ha ido bien por mi cuenta y he demostrado que no necesito a nadie. ¿Me oyes? ¡A nadie!».
traits.speaker: RTNeutralFemale

languages.text: “胡说八道！所谓‘权力的负担’，不过是那些位高权重的人编出来的胡话，防止其他人的觊觎。我一个人过得很好，我证明了我根本不需要别人。你听到了吗？我谁都不需要！”
languages.original_text: "Rubbish! The burden of power is a fiction invented by the powerful to shield themselves against envy. I did just fine on my own and proved that I need no one else. Do you hear me? No one!"

traits.locale_text: “胡说八道！把‘权力’称为‘负担’，正是那些位高权重的人想出来的点子，这样其他人就不会嫉妒他们了。我一个人做得很好，我也证明了我根本不需要别人。你听到了吗？！我什么人都不需要！”
traits.speaker: RTNeutralFemale

languages.text: 「くだらない！権威を重荷というのは、権力者がやっかみから身を守るために作り出した虚構だ。私は1人で十分にやってきたし、他の誰をも必要ないことも証明した。聞こえているか？誰も必要ないのだ！」
languages.original_text: "Rubbish! The burden of power is a fiction invented by the powerful to shield themselves against envy. I did just fine on my own and proved that I need no one else. Do you hear me? No one!"

traits.locale_text: 「くだらない！権威を重荷と呼ぶのは、権威を持っている人たちが妬まれないようにするために作り出したものだ。私は一人で十分にやってきたし、他の誰も必要としないことを証明した。聞こえたか？誰も必要ないんだ！」
traits.speaker: RTNeutralFemale

languages.text: "Unsinn! Die Bürde der Macht ist ein Märchen, mit dem sich die Mächtigen vor Neider schützen. Ich bin allein besten zurechtgekommen und habe bewiesen, dass ich niemand anderen brauche. Habt Ihr verstanden? Niemanden!"
languages.original_text: "Rubbish! The burden of power is a fiction invented by the powerful to shield themselves against envy. I did just fine on my own and proved that I need no one else. Do you hear me? No one!"

traits.locale_text: "Unsinn! Autorität eine Last zu nennen, ist eine Erfindung derer, die sie besitzen, damit man sie nicht gar so beneidet. Ich bin alleine besten zurechtgekommen und habe bewiesen, dass ich niemand anderen brauche. Habt Ihr mich gehört?! Niemanden!"
traits.speaker: RTNeutralFemale

languages.text: "Saçmalık! Gücün sorumluluğu, güçlülerin kendilerini kıskançlığa karşı korumak için uydurduğu bir şeydir. Ben kendi başıma gayet iyi idare ettim ve kimseye ihtiyacım olmadığını kanıtladım. Duydun mu? Hiç kimseye!"
languages.original_text: "Rubbish! The burden of power is a fiction invented by the powerful to shield themselves against envy. I did just fine on my own and proved that I need no one else. Do you hear me? No one!"
